text: Phumzile Maqondwana (born ) is a South African rugby union player for the in the Currie Cup and the Rugby Challenge. His regular position is flank. He made his Currie Cup debut for the Pumas in July 2019, coming on as a replacement in their opening match of the 2019 season against the . ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:People from Mbhashe Local Municipality Category:Rugby union flankers Category:Golden Lions players Category:Pumas (rugby team) players
title: Phumzile Maqondwana
